maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig:
\c[3]GF\c[0]: Entrance
\c[3]1F-10F\c[0]: Apartments
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text:
\c[3]RDC\c[0] : Entrée
\c[3]1E-10E\c[0] : Appartements

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Good day, Madam. Can I help you?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Bonjour, jeune fille. Puis-je vous aider ?
... Salut ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: I am terribly sorry, but we are currently offering no apartments.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Je suis vraiment désolée, mais pour le moment il ne nous reste aucun appartement.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Please contact our landlord in his office.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Veuillez contacter notre propriétaire. Vous pourrez le rencontrer dans son bureau.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Lea, dear!
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Lea, chérie !

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: You've done it again, young lady.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Tu m'as encore fait peur, jeune fille.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Maybe I should see a doctor about my ears...
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Peut-être qu'il faudrait que je voie un docteur pour mes oreilles...

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Are you up for finding another piece of broken equipment?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Est-ce que tu as envie de trouver un autre équipement cassé ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Great! I was just about to skim through these books. A player told me there is a hidden text here that leads to the next one.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Super ! J'étais prêt à parcourir ces livres. Un joueur m'a dit qu'il devrait y avoir y a un indice caché qui mène au prochain équipement.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: This time we're searching for a \c[3]Broken Deck\c[0]. That seems to be the default weapon of Hexacasts. A deck of cards.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Cette fois, nous cherchons des \c[3]\v[item.443.name]\c[0]. Les jeux de cartes sembleraient être les armes par défaut des Hexacasts.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Why not help me? We players can simply use our \c[3]Seeker Sense\c[0] or whatever it was called.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Tu veux m'aider ? Nous pourrions juste utiliser nos \c[3]Sens de \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] ou peu importe comment ça s'appelle.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Does come in handy for an old man like me.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Ça peut être pratique pour un vieil homme comme moi.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Anyway, are you ready?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: En tout cas, t'es prête ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Thanks, kid!
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Merci, gamine !

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Only two more to go.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Il m'en reste encore deux.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: But let's not get ahead of ourselves.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Mais ne mettons pas la charrue avant les bœufs.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Judging from the last couple of pieces, this one should be hidden somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0], right?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: En jugeant à partir des derniers morceaux, celui-là devrait être caché quelque part dans le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0], pas vrai ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Let's just start searching through these books.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Alors commençons par chercher dans ces livres.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: If you find something of use, you can go ahead and look for it.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Si tu trouves quelque chose d'utile, tu peux déjà te mettre en route.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: You know I'm too old to be running around willy-nilly.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Tu sais, je suis trop vieux pour aller courir partout sans but précis.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Kid, you know why I'm looking for these. Don't leave me hanging.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Gamine, tu sais pourquoi je les cherche. Ne me laisse pas tomber.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Hello young lady, found anything of use?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Bonjour, jeune femme. As-tu trouvé quelque chose d'utile ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Good job, kid! So tell me, what is it?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Bon travail, petite ! Donc dis-moi, qu'est-ce que tu as trouvé ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: ...Lea?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: ... Lea ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Your name is the clue?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Ton nom est l'indice ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Lea, I don't know what game you're trying to play but this is no way to treat your elders.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Lea, je ne sais pas à quel jeu tu joues mais ce n'est pas vraiment comme ça que l'on traite ses aînés.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Too bad... Guess we just have to keep looking.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Dommage... Alors nous devons continuer à chercher.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Welcome back kid, any luck finding the \c[3]Broken Deck\c[0]?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Rebonjour, petite. Tu as eu de la chance avec les \c[3]\v[item.443.name]\c[0] ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: I knew I could depend on you, Lea.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Je savais que je pouvais compter sur toi, Lea.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: That means there's only one left.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Cela veut dire qu'il en reste qu'un.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: How...?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Comment... ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Mm? What is it, kid?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Mmm ? Qu'est-ce qu'il y a, petite ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Why...?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Pourquoi... ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: I don't understand. Just say what you want.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Je ne comprends pas. Exprime-toi clairement, petite.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: You can't say?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Tu ne peux pas le dire ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: So you can say some words, but not full sentences?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Donc tu peux dire certains mots, mais pas de phrases complètes ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Well, that sure is weird. I know some people have problems with the talking in this game.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: C'est vraiment étrange. Je sais que certaines personnes ont des problèmes avec la voix dans ce jeu.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: But this is new.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Mais ça c'est nouveau.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Sorry...
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Désolée...

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: It's okay, Lea. We'll get around it somehow.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: C'est bon, Lea. On trouvera bien un moyen.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: I'll just keep asking and you can use your hands, head or whatever possible, okay?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Je vais juste continuer à te poser des questions et tu peux utiliser tes mains, ta tête ou tout ce qui est possible, OK ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Alright, so I will just take a wild guess and assume you want to know how this will all work out?
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Bon, donc je vais juste essayer et deviner que tu veux savoir comment tout va se terminer ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: As you know, my kids always wanted to find the treasure connected to the 5 broken arms.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Comme tu le sais, mes enfants ont toujours voulu trouver le trésor qui est lié au 5 équipements cassés.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Well... I promised my children we would find it.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Bien... j'ai promis à mes enfants que nous le trouverions.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: And I want to keep this promise by contacting them once we've found all of the pieces.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Et je voulais tenir cette promesse en les contactant une fois qu'on aurait trouvé toutes les parties.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: If I tell them I found all the broken bits... Maybe, just maybe, they will play with me again.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Si je leur dis que j'ai trouvé tous les morceaux cassés... Peut-être, je dis bien peut-être, qu'ils joueront à nouveau avec moi.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Thank you for your hard work. It's time for me to go.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Merci beaucoup pour tous tes efforts. Pour moi il est temps d'y aller.

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: The Lost Shrine
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: L'Autel Oublié

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Read Book
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Lire le livre

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: \c[3]The Lost Shrine\c[0]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: \c[3]L'Autel Oublié\c[0]

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Archaeologists once found a stone tablet near the entrance to the \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0]. On this tablet a riddle was written...
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: Les archéologues ont autrefois trouvé une tablette de pierre près de l'entrée du \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0]. Sur cette tablette, une énigme était écrite...

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig:
"Those who seek the lost shrine, must go to the most royal of coverts"
"Behind a tree..."
The latter part was already too old to read.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text:
"Ceux qui cherchent l'autel perdu, doivent aller sur le plus royal des boqueteaux"
"Derrière un arbre..."
La dernière partie était déjà trop ancienne pour être déchiffrée.
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.note: Hain can be translated as: foret, brousse, bois, boqueteau, bosquet

maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.orig: Below the text a strange sequence of arrows was written too. Researchers assume the shrine is to be found in the fittingly named area: \c[3]The Royal Grove\c[0]
maps/jungle-city/interior/house-01.json/.text: En dessous du texte, une séquence étrange de flèches étaient écrites. Les chercheurs pensent que l'autel doit se trouver dans la zone bien nommée : \c[3]Le Bosquet Royal\c[0]

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-1.json/en.orig:
\c[3]GF\c[0]: Items N' Goods
\c[3]1F\c[0]: Basin Arsenal
\c[3]2F\c[0]: Umbrella Inc.
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-1.json/en.text:
\c[3]RDC\c[0] : Objet & Matos
\c[3]1E\c[0] : Arsenal du Bassin
\c[3]2E\c[0] : Parapluie Inc.

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-1.json/en.orig: Welcome! Find all our vending goods here but with a personal touch.
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-1.json/en.text: Bienvenue ! Ici vous trouverez tout ce que l'on vend, mais avec une petite touche personnelle !

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Need some equipment on this rainy day?
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Peut-être avez-vous besoin de nouvel équipement en cette journée pluvieuse ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: I'm sorry dear customer, but Umbrella Inc. is currently experiencing a \..\..\.. sort of outbreak.
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Je suis désolée, cher client, mais Parapluie Inc. est en train de subir une \..\..\.. sorte d'invasion.

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: In order to avoid any residents from getting inf... \.\.\.from having a bad time, we have closed off access to the third floor.
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Pour empêcher tout résident d'être inf... \.\.\. de passer un mauvais moment, nous avons fermé l'accès au troisième étage.

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: Are you going to be done anytime soon?
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Est-ce que tu vas finir par être prêt ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: We spent like 30 minutes here, just take the stronger one.
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: On a déjà passé genre 30 minute ici, Hé. Prends juste le plus puissant.

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: But the stronger one looks worse...
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Mais le plus puissant à l'air ridicule...

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: What are you talking about? You know equipment doesn't change your appearance.
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Mec, de quoi tu parles ? Tu sais que les équipements ne changent pas ton apparence.

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: But why does it look different in the shelf then?
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Mais pourquoi ça a l'air différent dans les rayons ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.orig: Because it's more fancy? What do I know.
maps/jungle-city/interior/mall-2.json/en.text: Parce que c'est cool ? Qu'est-ce que j'en sais !
